Module: HTML_Report¶

report.html_report.create_main_html(qa_report_dir, obs_id, subpages, css_file=None, js_file=None, obs_info=None, osa_report='')[source]¶

Function to create the main HTML file

Args:
qa_report_dir (str): Directory of report obs_id (str): ID of observation subpages (list(str)): The subpages of the report css_file (str): The css file of the report (depracated) js_file (str): The javascript file for the report obs_info (dict): Information about the observation add_osa_report (bool): Update web report to add only the osa report.
report.html_report.write_html_end(html_file_name)[source]¶

This function closes an html document

report.html_report.write_html_header(html_file_name, js_file, css_file=None, page_type='index', obs_id=0)[source]¶

This function creates the header for an html document

report.html_report.write_html_navbar(html_file_name, links, page_type='preflag', obs_id=0)[source]¶

Function to add a navigation bar at the top of the website for each QA

report.html_report.write_html_obs_index(html_file_name, obs_id)[source]¶

This function creates an index for the list of observations
